mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (board_no, pet_no, pet_name, reply_no, comment, reply_date_time, pet_photo) VALUES (#{boardNo},#{petNo},#{petName},#{replyNo},#{comment},#{replyDateTime}, #{petPhoto})
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.pet_no, a.reply_no , a.comment , a.reply_date_time, b.pet_name, b.pet_photo FROM tbl_reply a INNER JOIN tbl_board b ON a.board_no = b.board_no WHERE b.board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY reply_date_time DESC
SELECT b.board_no, b.pet_no, a.reply_no , a.comment , a.reply_date_time, b.pet_name, b.pet_photo FROM tbl_reply a INNER JOIN tbl_board b ON a.board_no = b.board_no WHERE reply_no = #{replyNo};
